loading.title: Loading Servers
loading.description: Fetching latest server data from the API...

search.placeholder: Search servers, maps, players, mode, country, etc...

mapView.title: Map Order: {filters}
mapView.selectFilters: Select Quick Filters to View Map Order
mapView.chooseCategories: Choose your preferred map categories in Quick Filters to display the corresponding server list
mapView.noMaps: No maps found for selected filters.

refreshing.title: Refreshing server list
refreshing.description: Please wait while we fetch the latest data...

refreshSuccess.title: Refresh server list success
refreshSuccess.description: Data fetched successfully on {time}. Found {count} servers.

searchInput.title: Search Input
searchInput.description: Use this search box to find servers, maps, players, modes, countries, and more. Results update in real-time as you type!

columnVisibility.title: Column Visibility
columnVisibility.description: Customize which columns appear in your table. Show only the data that matters to you!

viewModeToggle.title: View Mode Toggle
viewModeToggle.description: Switch between list and map view modes to find servers in your preferred way. List view provides detailed information in a table format, while map view offers a geographical perspective.

helpGuide.title: Help Guide
helpGuide.description: Click this button anytime to replay the help guide and refresh your memory about the available features.

quickFilters.title: Quick Filters
quickFilters.description: Apply filters to quickly find servers matching specific criteria. You can use multiple filters together and combine them with the search box for powerful queries!
